description: Numbers n such that n remains prime through 5 iterations of function f(x) = 10x + 3.
comments: n, 10*n+3, 100*n+33, 1000*n+333, 10000*n+3333 and 100000*n+33333 are primes. [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 05 2010]
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [1..19000000] | IsPrime(n) and IsPrime(10*n+3) and IsPrime(100*n+33) and IsPrime(1000*n+333) and IsPrime(10000*n+3333) and IsPrime(100000*n+33333)] [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 05 2010]
author: _David W. Wilson_
